carbon_solubility_in_sea_water = variable 'carbon solubility in sea water' ((in the sense of Nitzbon et al. 2017, not in g/L but unitless!)), not None, scale=ratio, unit=unity [], >=0, default=1.5¶
ocean_atmosphere_diffusion_coefficient = variable 'ocean-atmosphere diffusion coefficient', not None, scale=ratio, unit=[a^-1], >=0, default=0.016¶
photosynthesis_sensitivity_on_atmospheric_carbon = variable 'sensitivity of photosynthesis productivity on atmospheric carbon density', not None, scale=ratio, unit=[3.162277660168379e-05 m³ a^-1 tC^-1.5], default=1100000.0¶

reference_temperature = variable 'reference temperature for relationship with atmospheric carbon' (default: pre-industrial value), not None, scale=ratio, unit=kelvins [K], >=0, default=287¶
